listitem.para: NUEVOS NOMBRES PARA LOS ENTEROS O PARECIDOS.
using sllint_t = signed long long int
using ullint_t = unsigned long long int
using digit_t = dig_t< type_traits::TypeFromIntNumber_t< static_cast< uint128_t >(B)>, static_cast< type_traits::TypeFromIntNumber_t< static_cast< uint128_t >(B)> >(static_cast< uint128_t >(B)) >
SOLO HAY QUE DECLARAR digit_t<2> o digit_t<10> o ...
using register_of_digits_t = reg_digs_t< type_traits::TypeFromIntNumber_t< B >, static_cast< type_traits::TypeFromIntNumber_t< B > >(B), L >
using register_digs_t = reg_digs_t< TypeFromIntNumber_t< static_cast< uint128_t >(B)>, static_cast< TypeFromIntNumber_t< static_cast< uint128_t >(B)> >(static_cast< uint128_t >(B)), L >
enum class sign_funct_e : char { vzero = 0 , vminus = -1 , vplus = +1 }
enum class dig_format_e : unsigned char { BINnat =0 , BCDnat =1 , BCDexc3 =2 , BCDaitk =3 , johnson_n =4 , biquinario =5 }
enum class num_type_e : unsigned char { natural =0 , entero =1 , racional =2 , real =3 }
YA INTRODUCIDO, PERO NO EXPLICITAMENTE NI COMPLETAMENTE.
enum class int_num_format_e : unsigned char { int_CB =0 , int_CBm1 =1 , int_MS =2 , int_EXC_n =3 }
enum class rat_num_format_e : unsigned char { pair_num_den =0 , fxd_pt =1 , flt_pt =2 }
EN C_B YA QUEDA EN MS.
enum class binop_e { add , sub , mult , div , rem , fediv , other }

std::ostream & operator<< (std::ostream &os, const nat_reg_digs_t< Int_Type, Base, Long > &arg)

constexpr reg_digs_t< UInt_t, B, N > concat (const reg_digs_t< UInt_t, B, N > &larg) noexcept

constexpr reg_digs_t< UInt_t, B, N+M > concat (const reg_digs_t< UInt_t, B, N > &larg, const reg_digs_t< UInt_t, B, M > &rarg) noexcept

constexpr reg_digs_t< UInt_t, B, 1+(sizeof ...(Ts))> concat (T0 dig0, Ts ... dig_pack) noexcept

constexpr reg_digs_t< UInt_t, B, M+1+(sizeof ...(Ts))> concat (T dig, Ts ... dig_pack, reg_digs_t< UInt_t, B, M > rarg) noexcept

constexpr reg_digs_t< UInt_t, B, N+(...+(N_pack))> concat (reg_digs_t< UInt_t, B, N > larg, reg_digs_t< UInt_t, B, N_pack > ... rarg_pack) noexcept

section.section:
aprox_units_divB() aprox_units_divBNumRepr NumRepraprox_units_divB template<typename UINT_T , UINT_T B, size_t N> requires (N>1)
constexpr reg_digs_t< UINT_T, B, N > NumRepr::aprox_units_divB (const reg_digs_t< UINT_T, B, N > & arg)[inline], [constexpr], [noexcept]
< PRECONDITIONS : ARG != 0 AND ARG != 1 >
FUNCIONES DE IMPLEMENTACION DE LA DIVISION ENTRE DOS REGISTROS DE DIGITOS BEGIN POSTCONDICION RET[N-1] == (DIG_1() | DIG_0()) POSTCONDICION RET[N-1] == DIG_1() => RET[N-2,0] == REGD_N_0() HAY QUE VER SI ES POTENCIA DE B : is_any_B_pow
CASO EN QUE LA LONGITUD PERMANECE 999 ; 998 ; 997 ; 996 099,9 ; 099,8 ; 099,7 ; 099,6 100 ; 100 ; 100 ; 100
CPARG == Bm1 Bm1 Bm1 ... Bm1 Bm1 Bm1 d0<B/2
CPARG == Bm1 dnm2 dnm3 ... d3 d2 d1 d0
Definicin en la lnea 1981 del archivo reg_digs_t.hpp. Grfico de llamadas para esta funcin:
Grfico de llamadas a esta funcin:

constexpr reg_digs_t< UINT_T, B, N > NumRepr::aprox_units_divB_n (const reg_digs_t< UINT_T, B, N > & arg)[inline], [constexpr], [noexcept]
FUNCION DE RECURSION PARA LA DIVISION APROX_COC_REM APROXIMA REMAINDER A 2 DIGITOS Y DIVISOR A 1 DIGITO

section.section:
concat()[1/10] concatNumRepr NumReprconcat template<typename UInt_t , UInt_t B, size_t N> requires (N>0)
